title.native: 骸骨騎士様、只今異世界へお出掛け中
title.romaji: Gaikotsu Kishi-sama, Tadaima Isekai e Odekakechuu

description:
One day, a gamer played video games until he fell asleep…and when he woke up, he found himself in the game world–as a skeleton! Equipped with the powerful weapons and armor of his avatar but stuck with its frightening skeletal appearance, Arc has to find a place for himself in this new, fantastical land. All his hopes for a quiet life are dashed when he crosses paths with a beautiful elven warrior, setting him on a journey full of conflict and adventure.

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
synonyms: บันทึกการเดินทางต่างโลกของท่านอัศวินกระดูก
Kesatria Tengkorak Berkelana di Dunia Lain
Hiệp Sĩ Xương Trên Đường Du Hành Đến Thế Giới Khác

tags.name: Skeleton
tags.description: Prominently features skeleton(s) as a character.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

node.description:
**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/katsuono)**

**Katsumi Ono** is a Japanese director, supervisor, episode director and storyboard artist.

[Profile (F.M.F)](http://www.fmf-music.com/members/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eba_cadode) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/eba_1987_/)

Eba is a Japanese music producer, guitarist, composer, arranger and member of pop unit [cadode](https://twitter.com/cadode_). He is also affiliated with F.M.F Corporation.

_Note: Not to be confused with the vocalist and lyricist with the same name [Hirokazu Ebata aka Eba](https://anilist.co/staff/161178)_

__[Website](https://www.tsubasanium.com/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsubasacurry)__ 

__Tsubasa Itou__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and orchestrator.
Kenta Tsuboi is a background artist.

[Website](https://dialogue-music.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DIALOGUE_staff) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/dialogue_staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/DIALOGUEOfficialChannel) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@dialogue_official)

DIALOGUE+ is a voice actress unit composed of the following members:

- [Yurina Uchiyama](https://anilist.co/staff/204404/Yurina-Uchiyama)
- [Nene Hieda](https://anilist.co/staff/163903/Nene-Hieda)
- [Kyouka Moriya](https://anilist.co/staff/164774/Kyouka-Moriya)
- [Yuuna Ogata](https://anilist.co/staff/190470/Yuuna-Ogata)
- [Ayaka Takamura](https://anilist.co/staff/204409/Ayaka-Takamura)
- [Satsuki Miyahara](https://anilist.co/staff/204411/Satsuki-Miyahara)
- [Mayu Iizuka](https://anilist.co/staff/166401/Mayu-Iizuka)
- [Manatsu Murakami](https://anilist.co/staff/204420/Manatsu-Murakami)

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/pellek/) | [Secondary YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/pellekofficial2/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/imPelleK) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/pellekofficial) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/realpellek/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/1qLwXsUtyW2Ba2Iotg4gE3?si=gEipapUxSCWSm4cmwqIU7A&nd=1) | [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/artist/pellek/411708930)

Per Fredrik Åsly, better known as PelleK, is a Norwegian YouTuber, singer, songwriter and actor.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/katsuono)**

**Katsumi Ono** is a Japanese director, supervisor, episode director and storyboard artist.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - The Wandering Knight Sets Out to Make the World a Better Place

Episode 8 - Allied! Dashing Through the Darkness With the Beastpeople!
Episode 9 - The Capital in Chaos and a Maiden’s Oath
Episode 10 - Hope for the Future Found in the Desert
Episode 11 - The Monster-Taming Barbarian Laughs in the Darkness
Episode 12 - I Shall Cut Through the World's Evils!
